com.catchoom.api

Class Catchoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.catchoom.api.Catchoom

  • public class Catchoom
extends Object
    Catchoom allows you to send requests to the Catchoom Recognition Server. For further information, please visit http://catchoom.com.
    Author:
    Catchoom

    • Method Detail

      • setResponseHandler

        public void setResponseHandler(CatchoomResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Sets the handler that will receive the callbacks from the server when performing operations.
        Parameters:
        responseHandler - The response handler.

      • connect

        public void connect(String token)
        Performs a connection against the Catchoom server. This request is asynchronous and will trigger a callback to a CatchoomResponseHandler once it completes. If it succeeds, the server will respond with its timestamp. If the request fails, a CatchoomErrorResponseItem will be sent.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to access the collection.

      • search

        public void search(String token,
          File image)
        Searches the image specified in a collection. This request is asynchronous and will trigger a callback to a CatchoomResponseHandler once it completes. If it succeeds, the server will respond with an ArrayList. This list can either contain several CatchoomSearchResponseItem or be empty depending on the number of coincidences found. If the request fails, a CatchoomErrorResponseItem will be sent.
        Parameters:
        token -
        image -

      • search

        public void search(String token,
          Bitmap image)
        Searches the image specified in a collection. This request is asynchronous and will trigger a callback to a CatchoomResponseHandler once it completes. If it succeeds, the server will respond with an ArrayList. This list can either contain several CatchoomSearchResponseItem or be empty depending on the number of coincidences found. If the request fails, a CatchoomErrorResponseItem will be sent.
        Parameters:
        token -
        image -
